benchmark_details.name: FD-Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: FD-Dataset is a bilingual fingerprinting benchmark comprising 90,000 text samples from 20 famous proprietary and open-source LLMs, designed to facilitate research in LLM attribution.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset that enhances research and development in the area of large language model attribution.

data.source: Generated texts from 20 proprietary and open-source LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model performance across various attribution tasks evaluated on FD-Dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Macro F1 scores indicate better performance in differentiating between LLM sources.
methodology.baseline_results: FDLLM achieves a Macro F1 score of 96.56% and accuracy values exceeding 95% on unseen models.
methodology.validation: Extensive empirical evaluations demonstrate the effectiveness of the FDLLM model on the FD-Dataset.
